means.word_mean: 1. (sports) the team that is trying to prevent the other team from scoring;

sentences.sentence: "his teams are always good on defense"

means.word_mean: 2. military action or resources protecting a country against potential enemies;

sentences.sentence: "they died in the defense of Stalingrad"
"they were developed for the defense program"

means.word_mean: 3. the defendant and his legal advisors collectively;

sentences.sentence: "sanitation is the best defense against disease"

means.word_mean: 6. the speech act of answering an attack on your assertions;

sentences.sentence: "his refutation of the charges was short and persuasive"
"in defense he said the other man started it"

means.word_mean: 7. the justification for some act or belief;

sentences.sentence: "he offered a persuasive defense of the theory"

means.word_mean: 8. a defendant's answer or plea denying the truth of the charges against him;
9. an organization of defenders that provides resistance against attack;
10. (psychiatry) an unconscious process that tries to reduce the anxiety associated with instinctive desires
